Class EnquiriesViewer

java.lang.Object
main.boundary.EnquiriesViewer
public class EnquiriesViewer extends Object
Boundary class for displaying enquiry information. Centralizes all enquiry viewing functionality across different user interfaces. Uses project name as the unique project identifier.

      Parameters:
      enquiries - List of Enquiry objects to display
      project - The Project object associated with the enquiries
      userRepository - UserRepository for applicant name lookup
